predicate.note: Frames file for 'decease' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, because this isn't a verb.

example.name: adjectival
example.text: And now that returns must show dependents' Social Security numbers, the IRS wants to see which dependents show up on more than one return -- and which dependents [*T*-3] turn out [*-5] to be deceased.
